categories: Category:Outer Rim Territories planets on the Hydian Way

nodes.text: Tierell was a planet located in the Tierell system within the Thesme sector of the Outer Rim Territories.

Located at the inersection of the Hydian Way and the Junction-Tierell Loop, Tierell and the planet Feriae Junction were the two ports that serve most traffic coming and going from the Loop Worlds of the Gordian Reach.
Tierell is incorrectly spelled "Tierrel" on the Gordian Reach map of The Essential Atlas.
